answers.answer: Hi, your kitty definitely needs some blood work to check for diabetes, thyroid disease, and kidney disease.  These conditions, unfortunately, are common in cats over 7 yrs old.  Your best bet is to get your kitty to the vet ASAP, find out what it is, and then come on back and we can give you some more help!   If you plan on getting your kitty checked for diabetes, your vet may want you to fast your kitty before the appointment-I'd let the receptionist know and get them to find out how long he needs to be fasted.  That way kitty will be ready for that test, and it'll save you a trip!Has your kitty shown any other symptoms?ZQ
